User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the RunAndDeploy application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, matches Firebase Auth UID.

email.description: User's email address for login and communication.

DeployedSite.title: DeployedSite
DeployedSite.description: Represents a link to a user's deployed code.

id.description: Unique identifier for the deployed site document.

userId.description: Reference to the User who created this link.

projectName.description: The name of the deployed project.

url.description: The URL where the code is deployed.

deployedAt.description: The timestamp when the site was deployed.
